card_text: You take no battle damage from attacks involving your "Cubic" monsters. You can only use each of the following effects of "Cubic Dharma" once per turn, during your Main Phase:$N●You can send 1 "Cubic" card from your hand to the GY, and if you do, draw 1 card.$N●You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 "Cubic" monster in your GY; add it to your hand.
